name: ArchitectSAP Solutions
overview:
ArchitectSAP Solutions is a boutique SAP solutions provider specializing in SAP ECC, HR and SCM, with special expertise in SAP NetWeaver. Using a judicious mix of onsite and offsite consulting, we leverage our offshore development center to bring cost savings to our European and North American customers for SAP outsourcing and offshoring services.

SAP Services:

  • SAP functional consulting in SAP ECC, HR and SCM
  • SAP ABAP and Advanced ABAP (WebDynpro, BSP, Workflow, Enhancement Framework)
  • SAP NetWeaver development in SAP Portals, BW, PI/XI, WebDynpro, Adobe, SOA and Solution Manager
  • Remote development, BASIS support and SAP solution monitoring

Key Differentiator:

  • Global project experienced team of SAP Principal Consultants, Lead NetWeaver Architects and SAP Certified consultants
  • Our SAP Principals have delivered global projects across diverse industries : Automobile, Chemical, Consumer Durables, Apparel, High Technology and Retail
  • Our Lead SAP Architect is a Technical Editor of the reputed SAP Professional Journal.
